item.description:
Hey hey, i'm just posting this as a second event as well for those who can't make incubator but still want to check out the show. It's all based on board games and will be a very unique Lost Marbles show, completely different from our previous shows except still funny! I hope to see a bunch of you there. Come on out and support!!!

Lost Marbles 10:30pm in the Cabaret Theatre at Improv Boston, $10 at the door.

You can also book online early for our show and any other show that's part of the Boston Improv Fest at http://www.bostonimpr...

Let me know if you have any questions!

Cheers

Jason J.
item.name: Improv Boston presents Lost Marbles as part of the 1st annual Boston Improv Fest
